translations: n.有吸引力的人或物（attractor 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Strange attractors create predictable patterns, often in chaotic systems.
sentences.translation: 在混乱的系统中创造出一个可以预测的模式。

sentences.sentence: My contention is that financial markets tend towards these strange attractors not to equilibrium.
sentences.translation: 我的论点是金融市场趋向这些奇怪的引资者不平衡。

sentences.sentence: earlybird focuses on the "you saw it first" experience that is one of the main attractors of users to the Twitter service.
sentences.translation: @earlybird专注于“最先发现”的体验，这是Twitter用户最感兴趣的特色之一。
